Item.Value: Um. Hi. I'm $Character_2$. I'm the Healer, I mean, apprentice Healer in town. You're an adventurer right? Well, if you ever need to be healed, or anything, you should come to the Apothecary.
Oh, $^$, it's nice to see you.
$^$, how are you? I... hope everything's alright with you.
Oh? No, you shouldn't have. I mean, I'm grateful but... If you're sure.
Oh! I've been wanting this! Thank you so much.
Hey, $^$, what do you need?[Talk:Talk|Gift:GiveGift|%Friend:50%Join Party:Party|Never Mind:Cancel]
Are you sure? I guess I can join you for an adventure today.
Sorry... I've got things to do today. Maybe later?
I don't like the rain. It's depressing.
I'm glad to see you today, $^$. You should try to dry off though. Those wet clothes can't be good for you. ... I mean, you should get home and dry off as soon as you can! That's all.
It's nice, isn't it? The snow I mean? I uh, hope you've dressed warm.
$^$... uh, how's the weather? I mean. How are you finding it? Not too cold I hope?
